front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Third Generation Video Coding
front.abstract: A set of high-efficiency video coding tools, including intra prediction, inter prediction, transform, entropy coding and loop filter, and corresponding decoding procedure, is defined in this standard. The target applications and services include, but are not limited to, digital television broadcasting, IPTV, video surveillance, video conference, Internet video streaming, and other video/audio-enabled services and applications such as user-generated multimedia content, digital storage media, and communication.
